title: Carve your initials
text: Normal damage and target suffers from humiliation and may only attack you (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Wis saving throw negates%).

title: Missing digits
text: Normal damage and target loses 1d3 fingers and takes 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Dex saving throw negates%).

title: Hack and slash
text: Double damage and all attack rolls of 19 or 20 against the target are critical hits for the next 3 rounds.

title: Stand aside
text: Double damage and push target 5 feet in any direction.

title: Severed tendon
text: Normal damage and 1d6 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Decapitation
text: Double damage and death (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Dex saving throw negates%).

title: Bewildering display
text: Double damage and target takes a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.

title: Long gash
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%.

title: Shattered jaw
text: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target cannot speak or bite %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Hamstring
text: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.

title: Brow to chin
text: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. The target has %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on Perception checks and ranged attacks %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Gut slash
text: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%. Target cannot swallow whole.

title: Wing tear
text: Double damage and target loses flight if it uses wings.

title: Missing ear
text: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration. The target has %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on Perception checks based on sound %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Wide open
text: Normal damage and target provokes opportunity attacks from all threatening opponents.

title: We've got a bleeder
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%.

title: Throat slash
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%. Target cannot talk or breathe normally %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Parrying strike
text: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round.

title: Lean into the blow
text: Triple damage, but you drop your weapon.

title: Flay
text: Normal damage plus 1d6 %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Paper cut
text: Normal damage and the target has %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage% on attack rolls and ability checks for 1d4 rounds.

title: Severed hand
text: Normal damage and target loses hand and takes 1d3 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Dex saving throw negates%).

title: Flat blade thwack
text: Triple bludgeoning damage.

title: Surprise opening
text: Double damage and one free attack against the target with %DISADVANTAGE=disadvantage%.

title: Broad swipe
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Disembowel
text: Double damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Sapping slash
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Rupture abdominal cavity
text: Double damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Muscle wound
text: Double damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.

title: Fingertipped
text: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target cannot use one hand %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Bad parry
text: Double damage and target has 1 item disarmed.

title: Nerve slice
text: Double damage and target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1 round.

title: Weapon strike
text: Double damage and %OBJECT-DAMAGE=normal damage% to target's weapon.

title: Tangled
text: Double damage and you may automatically grapple the target.

title: Momentum
text: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1d3 round.

title: Lip cut
text: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%. The next time he casts a verbal spell rolls 1d20: 1-10: the spell is lost. 11-20 the spell is cast.

title: Gory
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d6 rounds.

title: Across the eyes
text: Normal damage and target permanently %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Dex saving throw negates%).

title: Ugly wound
text: Normal damage and 1d3 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and 1 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates% Cha reduction).

title: Knockback
text: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 × 5 feet directly away.

title: Pain and simple
text: Double damage and 1d6 extra damage.

title: Cut straps
text: Double damage and if the target is wearing armor its speed is reduced by 10 feet until fixed (Requires Craft for 15% of the item value).

title: Severed spine
text: Double damage and 3d6 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw halves%).

title: Overhand chop
text: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Delayed wound
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.

title: Brow cut
text: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%. Target is %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% until healed.

title: Leg swipe
text: Double damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.

title: Terrible gash
text: Double damage and 1 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration.

title: Shield cleave
text: Double damage and %OBJECT-DAMAGE=normal damage% to target's shield.

title: Armor damage
text: Double damage and %OBJECT-DAMAGE=normal damage% to target's armor.

title: Swing through
text: Double damage and one free attack against an adjacent foe at the same bonus.

title: Spun around
text: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% for 1 round.
